alert.note: Alert for Cass; Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 7:24PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River near Kindred affecting Cass and Richland Counties. Maple River near Enderlin affecting Ransom and Cass Counties. Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Pembina River at Neche affecting Pembina County. .Snowmelt river flooding to continue. Rate of rise and ultimate crest is uncertain due to rate of ongoing snowmelt runoff and possible rain and colder temperatures in the forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River near Kindred. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Rural flooding near gage begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 17.5 feet early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
